title: Contemporary Novotel Semarang Escape near Paragon Mall with Pool, Spa & Two Restaurants
description:
Experience the cultural richness of Central Java with an elegant stay at this Novotel city oasis, located in the heart of Semarang's bustling business district, right across from Paragon Mall. A short stroll from the historic old town teeming with Dutch colonial buildings, antique shops and quaint cafes, this modern retreat acts as the perfect base for all your Semarang explorations.

Relax and unwind in the hotel's well-appointed rooms, take a refreshing dip in the shimmering outdoor pool, tuck into authentic Indonesian fare at the hotel's Square Restaurant and savour grilled delicacies at Citrus Restaurant. Later, head to Simpang Lima to experience the city's vibrant nightlife and indulge in epic culinary delights.
offer_address: Jl. Pemuda 123, Semarang 50132, Central Java, Indonesia

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Semarang Simpang Lima
title: Stylish Semarang City Break in the Heart of Simpang Lima
description: Positioned in the heart of the city’s fast-emerging commercial, retail and dining precinct Holiday Inn Express Semarang Simpang Lima, an IHG Hotel, offers guests the perfect base to discover Central Java’s vibrant capital - and all just 20 minutes from Jenderal Ahmad Yani International Airport. Spend your days exploring Semarang’s rich Dutch-Chinese heritage - including the Old City, Gedung Batu temple complex and the iconic thousand doors of Lawang Sewu.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Semarang Simpang Lima, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 145, Jalan Ahmad Yani, Semarang 50241, Java, Indonesia
